summary: The diff implements most requirements but has critical gaps. REQ-1 (Arweave removal) is incomplete: KeyfilePicker.tsx and arweaveClient.ts are still present (not deleted). REQ-6 (thumbnails in MyUploadsPage) is partially implemented with icons but not actual thumbnails. All other requirements (REQ-2 through REQ-5) appear to be fully implemented based on the available evidence.

missing_requirements.requirement: Delete KeyfilePicker component and arweaveClient.ts library
missing_requirements.reason: KeyfilePicker.tsx and arweaveClient.ts are listed in MODIFIED FILES but not REMOVED FILES, indicating they still exist in the codebase when they should be deleted

missing_requirements.requirement: Display uploaded media with thumbnails when possible
missing_requirements.reason: UploadsList.tsx shows file type icons (ImageIcon, Video, FileText) instead of actual image/video thumbnails. The code renders icons based on contentType but does not generate or display thumbnail previews of the actual media files

hallucinated_features.description: Migration module for converting old file metadata to new schema
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest contains no requirements for data migration or backward compatibility with previous versions. The migration.mo file handles conversion from old Arweave-based metadata format to new ICP format, which was not requested
